mapper.select: select * from (select TB_PRODUCT.*, rank() over(order by reg_dtm desc) as myrank from TB_PRODUCT) rank_table where myrank<=3
select p.*, sort_table.sumqt from TB_PRODUCT p, (select prd_no,sum(qty) sumqt from TB_ORDER_PRODUCT group by prd_no order by sumqt desc) sort_table where p.prd_no = sort_table.prd_no and rownum<=4
select * from tb_product where CATEGORY_NO = (select CATEGORY_NO from TB_CATEGORY where category_nm = #{category_nm})
